about_the_game:
With ninja costumes for the entire cast, skin-baring costumes, and cool new takes on DOA5 classic costumes, this set has a little something for every fighter.

Includes the following 68 costumes:

・10 Sexy Bunny costumes
・10 Overalls costumes
・10 Bath & Bedtime costumes
・30 Ninja Clan costumes (Vol. 1-3)
・8 Showstoppers Encore costumes

*You must have the latest update installed before using this content.

©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.

About the Game

With ninja costumes for the entire cast, skin-baring costumes, and cool new takes on DOA5 classic costumes, this set has a little something for every fighter. Includes the following 68 costumes: ・10 Sexy Bunny costumes ・10 Overalls costumes ・10 Bath & Bedtime costumes ・30 Ninja Clan costumes (Vol. 1-3) ・8 Showstoppers Encore costumes *You must have the latest update installed before using this content. ©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
  • Additional Notes: Online modes for Dead or Alive 5 Last Round will be added in a patch within 3 months of release.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
  • Additional Notes: Online modes for Dead or Alive 5 Last Round will be added in a patch within 3 months of release.

oflc.descriptors: Violence, sexualised imagery and nudity, online interactivity

pegi.descriptors: Violence, sexual and online gameplay with other people.

*languages with full audio support
